body: Let's add this to contrib for one release before we commit to supporting this API forever. To do so, remove this @@ annotation here, revert the change to tensorflow.pbtxt, and add visibility: HIDDEN to the apidef.pbtxt proto. Then, import this symbol (broadcast_to) from https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/framework/__init__.py so it gets exposed as tf.contrib.framework.broadcast_to

Then, import this symbol (broadcast_to) from https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/framework/__init__.py so it gets exposed as tf.contrib.framework.broadcast_to
body_text: Let's add this to contrib for one release before we commit to supporting this API forever. To do so, remove this @@ annotation here, revert the change to tensorflow.pbtxt, and add visibility: HIDDEN to the apidef.pbtxt proto. Then, import this symbol (broadcast_to) from https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/framework/__init__.py so it gets exposed as tf.contrib.framework.broadcast_to
